name: Black Label Trading Co. - Redemption - Robusto
additionalNotes: The "Black Redemption Sound" featuring Ras Kush & Ras Takashi as Wackies official sound, toured Japan from September 1998 until March 1999 establishing The Wackies Far East Chapter. From 1999, Ras Kush began studio works in a serious way with focus on releasing and establishing "The Black Redemption Label". In 2001, the first 7" release featuring the legendary Glen Brown, went into manufacturing and the following year it gained international distribution. Redemption Reserve is simple but done very well, so you will taste different undertones and notes that lend to its realistic taste, with aÂ rich, velvety vanilla custard is given new life with the incredible texture and flavor that this vape juice is able to give you with it.
